alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 9:56AM EST until February 12 at 4:17PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Mount Vernon. .Recent precipitation has caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at Mount Vernon is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday evening, and will remain above flood stage for the rest of the week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Mount Vernon. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 25.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Tuesday evening to a crest of 37.5 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
